subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: A chopper that hit the bag and caromed into left field, a Tiger thrown out at the plate and a bunt that somehow stayed fair set up the Giants’ victories in Games 1 and 2.
snippet: A chopper that hit the bag and caromed into left field, a Tiger thrown out at the plate and a bunt that somehow stayed fair set up the Giants’ victories in Games 1 and 2.
